name: Greeny's Saga
description:
Mini relaxing game where you should help Greeny (cute alien) to renew 10 planets

(jk,  4 of em repeats so there are only 6 planets) 

!!! Levels from 7 to 10 may hurt your eyes, play em with short breaks !!!

I challenged myself to create mini game from zero knowledge in programming...

Unity5 one love

if smn sees my scripts I'll be super ashamed 8)
